greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 0 of the matrix logarithm (A111818) of triangle A078536, which shifts columns left and up under matrix 4th power; these terms are the result of multiplying the element in row n by n!.
comment: Let q=4; the g.f. of column k of A078536^m (matrix power m) is: 1 + Sum_{n>=1} (m*q^k)^n/n! * Product_{j=0..n-1} A(q^j*x).
formula: E.g.f. satisfies: x/(1-x) = Sum_{n>=1} Prod_{j=0..n-1} A(4^j*x)/(j+1).
example: Let G(x) be the g.f. of A111817 (column 1 of A078536), then
results.author: _Gottfried Helms_ and _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 22 2005
